title: Web Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Collaborative Science Class Design Workshop Using Immersive Virtual Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic science education theories and experience with general VR device usage
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Can explain four core elements (shared goals, role distribution, interaction structure, feedback system) for designing VR-based collaborative activities in science classes
Can operate science experiment classes by applying three or more collaborative strategies in VR simulation environments
Can develop a rubric for evaluating VR learning modules that promote social interaction among learners
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
